ing: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is my mom's favorite salad. My grandmother always made it during the holidays in Alabama."
ins: In a large bowl, combine mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, bananas, coconut, marshmallows, and pecan pieces. Fold in whipped topping. Garnish with maraschino cherries. Chill for 1 hour or overnight.
